trans-unit.source: Represents a row in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en rad i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRow class represents a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewRow representerer en rad i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve rows through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> collections of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente rader i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>samlinger kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, a DataGridViewRow physically contains a collection of all of the cells in that row.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, en DataGridViewRow fysisk inneholder en samling av alle cellene i raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til denne samlingen via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRow class is used to access the individual cell elements, as well as to adjust the appearance and behavior of the row user interface (UI), such as height and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewRow brukes til å få tilgang til enkelte celler elementene, i tillegg til å justere utseendet og virkemåten til rad-brukergrensesnittet (UI), for eksempel høyde og celle stil.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will want all rows or most rows in the control to share the same characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, vil alle rader, eller de fleste rader i kontrollen skal har samme egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: To set cell styles for all rows in the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi cellestiler for alle rader i kontrollen, kan du angi egenskapene for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To set styles for alternating rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi stiler for alternative rader, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om cellestiler [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to define a row that will be used as a basis for all rows added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi en rad som skal brukes som grunnlag for alle rader som er lagt til i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will share DataGridViewRow objects across multiple data rows whenever possible to avoid performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen deler DataGridViewRow objekter på tvers av flere datarader når det er mulig å unngå ytelse bestemmelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Unless you are working with large amounts of data and experiencing performance issues, you can typically ignore row sharing.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre du arbeider med store mengder data og opplever problemer med ytelse, kan du vanligvis ignorere rad deler.

trans-unit.source: A shared row is indicated by an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property value of -1.
trans-unit.target: En delt rad er angitt med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>egenskapsverdien -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some members of the DataGridViewRow class cannot be used with shared rows, but you can unshare a row by accessing it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Noen medlemmer av klassen DataGridViewRow kan ikke brukes med delte rader, men du kan oppheve deling en rad ved å åpne den i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows can also become unshared in other ways.
trans-unit.target: Rader kan også bli delt på andre måter.

trans-unit.source: To access a row without unsharing it, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til en rad uten avslutting av deling av den, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When working with large amounts of data, you should be aware of how rows are shared and unshared to avoid performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: Når du arbeider med store mengder data, må du være klar over hvordan rader delt og opphevet for å unngå ytelse bestemmelser.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> class without using a template.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> klasse uten å bruke en mal.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the row in its blank state.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer rad i den tomme tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>tilordnet av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å styre forekomsten ble returnert fra denne metoden, eller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>som er tilordnet til kontrollen, opprettes en ny forekomst av en.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the AccessibilityObject property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å hente eller angi egenskapen AccessibilityObject, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samlingen er installert med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om tilgjengelig objekter, se delen "Aktiv tilgjengelighet" i MSDN-biblioteket på [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>tilordnet av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies an input row header border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Endrer en kantlinjestil for inndata rad-overskrift i henhold til de angitte kriteriene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the borders for the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen internt kaller AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle-metode for å finne utseendet til kantlinjene for rad overskriftsceller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen brukes vanligvis verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen for den `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the row header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjestilen rad topptekst for å endre.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the row header border style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som brukes til å lagre mellomliggende endringer kantlinjestil for rad-hodet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a single vertical border to the result; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>legge til en enkelt loddrett kantlinje bokstaver. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a single horizontal border to the result; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>legge til en enkelt vannrett kantlinje bokstaver. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is the first row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden er den første raden som vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden er den siste raden i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som har den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>-egenskapen satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the new border style used.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer den nye kantlinjestilen brukes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells that populate the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter samling av celler som fyller ut raden.

trans-unit.source: If the row does not contain any cells when this property is accessed, a new empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> will be created by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis raden ikke inneholder noen celler når denne egenskapen, en ny, tom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>opprettes av et kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection"></xref> that contains all of the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle cellene i raden.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this row.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne raden.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method copies the row and its property values, but does not copy the cell values that the row contains.
trans-unit.target: Metoden klone kopierer raden og egenskapsverdiene, men Kopier ikke celleverdiene som inneholder raden.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to copy cell values when cloning a row, see the example section.
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du kopierer celleverdiene når kloning en rad i avsnittet eksempel.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr klone-metoden når du avledes fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>og legge til nye egenskaper utledede klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigmenyen for raden.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is displayed when the user right-clicks the row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event or the row ContextMenuStrip property overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir hurtigmenyen som vises når brukeren høyreklikker raden med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelse eller raden ContextMenuStrip egenskapen overstyrer hurtigmenyen for denne cellen som ble klikket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`, henting av verdien for ContextMenuStrip egenskapen hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen for kontrollen, og returnerer verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen som angitt i behandlingsprogram.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen behandlingsprogrammer for hendelsen, henting av verdien for egenskapen ContextMenuStrip returnerer tidligere angitte verdien eller standardverdien for `null`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the row ContextMenuStrip value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen er spesielt nyttig når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser ved angivelse av raden ContextMenuStrip verdien for flere rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen endres opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>hendelse på den eiende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, hvis det finnes en.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the current row is shared, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A> method rather than getting the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den gjeldende raden deles, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A>-metoden i stedet for henting av verdien for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When getting the value of this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av verdien for denne egenskapen, raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er tilgjengelig for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samlingen er installert med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Clears the existing cells and sets their template according to the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> template.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner de eksisterende cellene og angir mal i henhold til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> mal.

trans-unit.source: This method clears the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> and reinitializes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property of each column of the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>og initialiserer den med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>for hver kolonne i den `dataGridView` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the row adopts the appearance and behavior of a row from the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet raden overføres utseendet og virkemåten for en rad fra den `dataGridView` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that acts as a template for cell styles.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som fungerer som en mal for cellestiler.

trans-unit.source: dataGridView is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewis .

trans-unit.source: A row that already belongs to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was added.
trans-unit.target: En rad som tilhører allerede den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ble lagt til.

trans-unit.source: -or- A column that has no cell template was added.
trans-unit.target: - eller en kolonne som inneholder ingen celle mal ble lagt til.

trans-unit.source: Clears the existing cells and sets their template and values.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner de eksisterende cellene og angir deres malen og verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method clears the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> and reinitializes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property of each column of the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>og initialiserer den med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>for hver kolonne i den `dataGridView` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the row adopts the appearance and behavior of a row from the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet raden overføres utseendet og virkemåten for en rad fra den `dataGridView` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: If there are more elements in the `values` array than cells to be initialized, the extra elements will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er flere elementer i den `values` matrise enn celler skal kunne initialiseres ekstra elementer ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer elements than required, the remaining unmatched cells will retain their default initial values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er færre elementer enn nødvendig, beholder gjenværende uten cellene første standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that acts as a template for cell styles.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som fungerer som en mal for cellestiler.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that initialize the reset cells.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av objekter som starte tilbakestilling av cellene.

trans-unit.source: Either of the parameters is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av parameterne er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A row that already belongs to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was added.
trans-unit.target: En rad som tilhører allerede den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ble lagt til.

trans-unit.source: -or- A column that has no cell template was added.
trans-unit.target: - eller en kolonne som inneholder ingen celle mal ble lagt til.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new collection of cells based on this row.
trans-unit.target: Bygger en ny samling av celler basert på denne raden.

trans-unit.source: This method creates an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.Count%2A> property set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, oppretter et tomt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.Count%2A>egenskapen satt til 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den nyopprettede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data-bound object that populated the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter databindingselementer-objektet som utfylt raden.

trans-unit.source: Accessing data-bound objects directly through row objects is useful when you do not have direct access to the data source containing the objects.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til databindingselementer objekter direkte via rad objekter er nyttig når du ikke har direkte tilgang til datakilden som inneholder objektene.

trans-unit.source: It is also convenient when you want to manipulate objects bound to selected rows or to rows passed as arguments to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Det er også nyttig når du vil redigere objekter som er bundet til merkede radene eller rader ble sendt som argumenter til hendelsesbehandling.

trans-unit.source: The data-bound <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Databindingselementer <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default styles for the row, which are used to render cells in the row unless the styles are overridden.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstiler for raden som brukes til å gjengi cellene i raden med mindre stilene overskrives.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Viser cellene ved hjelp av stiler som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen som arver stiler fra andre egenskaper av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> for kontrollen</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in this row, the styles specified through the DefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties, but are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For celler i denne raden overstyre stiler som er angitt i egenskapen DefaultCellStyle stiler angitt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper, men av stiler angitt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av denne egenskapen en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med standard verdier opprettes hvis egenskapen ikke har allerede blitt åpnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til en innvirkning på ytelsen ved henting av denne egenskapen for mange rader.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Når det er mulig å bruke én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>å angi denne egenskapen for flere rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes som standard.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this row is displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne raden skal vises på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is currently displayed on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden vises på skjermen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the row divider.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på rad skillelinjen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful to provide a visual boundary between frozen rows and rows that can scroll.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er nyttig for å angi en visual grense mellom låste rader og rader som kan rulle.

trans-unit.source: The extra edge is part of the current row, although it will take on the foreground color of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra kanten er en del av den gjeldende raden, selv om det tar i forgrunnsfargen på den tilknyttede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The extra edge does not extend the area in which users can double-click to automatically resize a row.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra kanten utvider ikke området som brukere kan Dobbeltklikk for å endre størrelsen på en rad automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To resize a row, the user must double-click on the boundary between the divider and the adjacent row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på en rad, må brukeren dobbeltklikke grensen mellom skillelinjen og tilstøtende raden.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the divider (the row's bottom margin).
trans-unit.target: Høyden på skillelinjen (den raden bunnmargen) i piksler.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle around the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Tegner Fokusrektangelet rundt angitte grensene.

trans-unit.source: The `rowIndex` parameter is not used in the base-class implementation of the DrawFocus method, although it can be used when overriding this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Den `rowIndex` parameteren ikke brukes i basisklasse implementeringen av metoden DrawFocus selv om den kan brukes når overstyrer denne metoden i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må males.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som inneholder grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir status for raden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> used to paint the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader Fokusrektangelet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of `cellStyle` as the color of the focus rectangle; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of `cellStyle` as the color of the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>du bruker den <> </> *> for `cellStyle` som fargen for Fokusrektangelet; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å bruke den <> </> *> for `cellStyle` som fargen for Fokusrektangelet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message text for row-level errors.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir feilmeldingstekst for radnivå feil.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide an error message for row-level errors.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen skal kunne en feilmelding på radnivå feil.

trans-unit.source: The specified message is displayed in a ToolTip when the user moves the mouse pointer over the error icon shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte meldingen vises i et verktøytips når brukeren flytter pekeren over Feilikonet vises i radoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, the error icon is resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` If this row is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, setting this property will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Start med .NET Framework 4.5.2 ikonet endres i henhold til systeminnstillingen ppt når app.config-filen inneholder følgende oppføring: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` Hvis denne raden er knyttet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll, angi denne egenskapen vil øke det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the error message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder feilmeldingen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When getting the value of this property, the row is a shared row in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av verdien for denne egenskapen, raden er en delt rad i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om raden er låst.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you keep one or several rows of important information in place when a user scrolls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du holde én eller flere rader med viktig informasjon på plass når brukeren ruller via <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: All rows above the frozen row are also frozen.
trans-unit.target: Alle rader over låste raden er også låst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden er låst; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.target: Henter hurtigmenyen for raden.

trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder feil.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error of the row at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: En streng som beskriver feil i raden i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.target: Raden tilhører en kontrollen og rowIndex er mindre enn null eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus&1;.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the ideal height of the specified row based on the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Beregner den ideelle radhøyden angitte basert på de angitte kriteriene.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to determine the ideal height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes av funksjonen innhold basert størrelse automatisk for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen for å bestemme ideelle høyden på en rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The `rowIndex` value lets you specify the actual row index of a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Den `rowIndex` verdien lar deg angi den faktiske radindeksen for en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: (Shared rows have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property values of -1.) A `fixedWidth` parameter value of `false` calculates the row height based on calculated column widths that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios.
trans-unit.target: (Delt rader har <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>egenskapsverdier-1.)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> En `fixedWidth` parameterverdien `false` beregner radhøyden basert på beregnet kolonnebredder som vil oppnå ideelle celle bredde og høyde forhold.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Cellestilen som gjelder for cellen må ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> for celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om størrelse automatisk [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row whose preferred height is calculated.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden der foretrukket høyde er beregnet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"></xref> that specifies an automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"> </xref> som angir en størrelse automatisk-modus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the preferred height for a fixed cell width; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å beregne foretrukket høyde for en fast cellebredde; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ideal height of the row, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den ideelle radhøyden, i piksler.

trans-unit.source: autoSizeRowMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowModeer ikke et gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: The rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Den rowIndex er ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the current state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir den gjeldende tilstanden til raden.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the state of a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig å avgjøre statusen til en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Shared rows have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> values of -1, which prevents you from using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.State%2A> property with shared rows.
trans-unit.target: Delt rader har <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>verdier-1, som hindrer deg i å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.State%2A>egenskap med delte rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method, pass in the actual row index.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne metoden, kan du sende i den faktiske radindeksen.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the actual index of a shared row by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente den faktiske indeksen for en delt rad ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.IndexOf%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the row state.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden rad.

trans-unit.source: The row has been added to a control, but the rowIndex value is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Raden har blitt lagt til en kontroll, men rowIndex verdien er ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: The row is not a shared row, but the rowIndex value does not match the row's property value. -or- The row has not been added to a control, but the rowIndex value does not match the row's property value.
trans-unit.target: Raden er ikke en delt rad, men rowIndex verdien samsvarer ikke med raden <> *> egenskapsverdi. - eller - raden har ikke blitt lagt til en kontroll, men rowIndex verdien samsvarer ikke med raden <> *> egenskapsverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row's header cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den raden hodet cellen.

trans-unit.source: The header cell of a row is typically used to display a row label.
trans-unit.target: Hodet cellen i en rad brukes vanligvis til å vise en radetikett.

trans-unit.source: Users can also click the row header to select the row if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Brukere kan også klikke radoverskrift slik at raden hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> that represents the header cell of row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref> som representerer overskrift-celle i raden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current height of the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det gjeldende radhøyden.

trans-unit.source: To set the minimum height for a row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du angir minimumshøyden for en rad ved bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på raden i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default is the height of the default font plus 9 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er høyden på standardskrift pluss 9 piksler.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style in effect for the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter cellestilen i kraft for raden.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful to determine which cell styles are applied to all cells in a row regardless of any column styles that are also applied to the cells.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er nyttig for å finne ut hvilke cellestiler som brukes til alle celler i en rad uavhengig stiler en kolonne som brukes også til cellene.

trans-unit.source: The row InheritedStyle property inherits its values from the following properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> (for rows with odd index number) - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Raden InheritedStyle egenskapen arver verdiene fra følgende egenskaper:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(for rader med indeksen oddetall) - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>For mer informasjon om celle stil arv, kan du se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that specifies the formatting and style information for the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som angir informasjonen formatering og stil for cellene i raden.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the row is the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om raden er raden for nye poster.

trans-unit.source: Because the row for new records is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection, use the IsNewRow property to determine whether a row is the row for new records or is a populated row.
trans-unit.target: Fordi raden for nye poster i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>samling, Bruk IsNewRow-egenskapen for å finne ut om en rad er raden for ny poster eller er en fylt rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: A row stops being the new row when data entry into the row begins.
trans-unit.target: En rad stopper som den nye raden når data skal registreres i raden begynner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, which is used for the entry of a new row of data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden er den siste raden i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, som er brukt for registrering av en ny rad med data; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum height of the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimumshøyden for raden.

trans-unit.source: The MinimumHeight property maintains the display of the row by setting a limit to how far the user can resize the row's height through the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MinimumHeight opprettholder visning av raden ved å angi en grense på hvor langt for brukeren kan endre størrelse på radhøyden via brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: The minimum row height in pixels, ranging from 2 to <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Minste radhøyden i piksler, varierer fra 2 til <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 3.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 2.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn 2.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current row.
trans-unit.target: Maler gjeldende rad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to paint the row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen kaller opp denne metoden hvis du vil fargemerknader i raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a handler for the event does not set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, this method also calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintHeader%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintCells%2A> methods and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen ikke angir den <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`, denne også metodekall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintHeader%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintCells%2A>metoder og hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om delt rader [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the Resizable property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, the user will not be able to manually adjust the row height.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen kan endre størrelse på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, brukeren ikke justere manuelt radhøyden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Resizable property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value.
trans-unit.target: Som standard kan endre størrelse på egenskapsverdien er basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, however, the control value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter eksplisitt endre størrelsen til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, men kontrollverdien ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> to restore the value-inheritance behavior.
trans-unit.target: Endre størrelsen WantDestinationQueue <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>til å gjenopprette verdien arv virkemåten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> restores the value inheritance, the Resizable property will never return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> value unless the row has not been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>gjenoppretter verdi-arv egenskapen kan endre størrelse på aldri vil returnere en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>verdi hvis raden ikke har blitt lagt til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine whether the Resizable property value of a row is inherited or has been specified explicitly, check its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger å avgjøre om størrelsen egenskapsverdien for en rad hentes eller angis eksplisitt, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> flag, the Resizable property value is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>verdien inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>flagg kan endre størrelse på egenskapsverdien er ikke arvet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref> value that indicates whether the row can be resized or whether it can be resized only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref> verdi som angir om raden kan endres eller om den kan endres bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om raden er valgt.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om delt rader [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden er merket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of the row's cells.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdiene i den raden celler.

trans-unit.source: The `values` parameter represents a variable number of arguments used to populate cell values in the row.
trans-unit.target: Den `values` parameteren representerer en variabel antall argumenter som brukes til å fylle celleverdiene i raden.

trans-unit.source: These values can be passed to this method as multiple, individual arguments or as members of a single <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Disse verdiene kan sendes til denne metoden som flere argumenter eller medlemmer av én <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Because the values are expected to be instances of type <xref:System.Object>, however, if you pass in an array of value-type values (such as <xref:System.Int32> values), this method will treat the array as a single object and assign it to a single cell.
trans-unit.target: Fordi verdiene er forventet å være forekomster av typen <xref:System.Object>, men hvis du vil sende i en matrise med verditypen verdier (eksempel <xref:System.Int32>verdier), denne metoden skal behandle matrisen som et enkelt objekt og tilordne den til én celle.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, you must cast a value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array or pass in multiple values as multiple arguments.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil unngå dette problemet, må du endrer en verdi av typen matrise til en <xref:System.Object>matrise eller sende i flere verdier som flere argumenter.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If there are more values in the `values` list than there are cells to be initialized, this method ignores the extra values and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes flere verdier i de `values` listen enn det er celler skal kunne initialiseres, denne metoden Ignorerer ekstra verdier, og returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `false` if any of the specified values cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer også `false` Hvis noen av de angitte verdiene ikke kan angis.

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer values than there are cells, the remaining unmatched cells retain their current values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er færre verdier enn antallet celler, beholde gjenværende uten cellene gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: One or more objects that represent the cell values in the row.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere objekter som representerer celleverdiene i raden.

trans-unit.source: -or- An <xref:System.Array> of <xref:System.Object> values.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en <xref:System.Array>av <xref:System.Object>verdier.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all values have been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle verdier som er definert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: values is .
trans-unit.target: valuesis .

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is operating in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> opererer i virtuelle modus.

trans-unit.source: -or- This row is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: - eller - raden er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter den gjeldende tilstanden til raden.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with shared rows because shared rows do not store their state locally.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke bruke denne egenskapen med delte rader fordi delt rader ikke lagre tilstanden til lokalt.

trans-unit.source: To get the state of a shared row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente statusen til en delt rad, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the row state.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden rad.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that describes the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter en lesbar streng som beskriver raden.

trans-unit.source: This overridden version of the ToString method supplies the class name and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> information for this instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne overstyrte versjon av metoden ToString leverer klassenavnet og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>informasjon for denne forekomsten av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes this row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver denne raden.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om raden er synlig.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to hide a row from view while keeping the row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen for å skjule en rad fra visningen mens raden i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To completely remove a row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne en rad fullstendig, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden er i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere og er en delt rad.
